::Spears::

she emerges from the chamber, mostly healed.  She looked and saw most 
of her quills were repaired and her major wounds were mostly 
healed. "Well, I can get fixed up another time."  She ran down the 
hallway, pulling a quill out and extending it out to a spear and ran 
for the entrance.
